content.detailedDescription:
We were moving home and my grandmother told my son, look there is a bright star! but in the direction she pointed i saw the bright moving star. and i said, granny, thats not a star, thats an ufo. 

i watched it till it turned orange, then it disappeared faster then it flew over our heads. it was like a 'hello, here we are, byeeeeee' feeling. 
im frustrated because i didnt got my camera with me :(

atleast i got some witnesses. my husband, my grandma, and the sister from my husband.

i like the map, keep up the good work. respect and love from my whole heart to you guys. 

greetings :)
content.summary: Flew over our heads like a bright star, turned red and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside onto my balcony, facing east, to smoke a cigarette at 12:45 pm with a another witness. i looked up to see the clear sky and my eye caught two jet planes flying on the same flight path really close together. i noticed one left a contrail while the other didn't display any condensation coming out the tail. the two aircraft were flying north east, towards area 51. within seconds of looking at this strange sight of two jets next to each other like that, i saw an orangish-red star-like object appear right in front of the aircraft, heading southwest from the north east. the object appeared to fly slowly right in between the two aircraft, and then the aircraft continued to fly away as the object remained in the general location. the object then switched directions for only a few seconds, slowly moving back the direction it came, which was the same flight pattern of the aircraft. seconds later it appeared to hover in place, appearing orangish for a second and then flashing a reflection of sunlight and then disappear. a second later it would reappear in the same order, a solid orange looking star-like object, a second later into a reflective flash and then disappear. after about 3 minutes of this object hovering in one place, it slowly began to move southeast to about 80 degrees above my balcony, where it appeared to stop and hover again. the pattern of the orange, reflective flash and disappearing didn't change but the timing of when this occurred fluctuated. it appeared as though the object had ascended to a higher altitude by the time it reached 80 degrees above me and hovered again. the object appeared to look a little smaller. from there, i leaned against a wall and used my roof as a measurement to the object in order to see if it was moving at all. it remained exactly in it's new 80 degree location for about 5 to 7 minutes. approximately 10 minutes into the entire encounter, i noticed the object appeared to be ascending rapidly up into the sky. at first for about 10 seconds i could see the object getting smaller and smaller. the last second or two i could see the color and refection faintly zip upward into the sky and disappearing. i waited another couple minutes to see if the object would appear again and nothing more was seen.
content.summary: Star-like object orange & reflective flashing hovering and acending

content.detailedDescription:
Driving southbound on beech daly in dearborn heights, mi. between joy rd and warren rd. 
looked up and noticed a silver disc hovering in the sw sky. not sure about distance but it was very high up. it took a path going my direction, south. this took around 30 seconds. 
suddenly it was just gone, blink of an eye, gone. no tail. 
the skies were clear, sunny. it was silver. not reflecting light. just silver. 
what's notable is that this is only about a 20 minute drive from the airport.
there was not much traffic, i slowed down to watch it. i looked down to watch where i was going, i looked up, saw it for a quick second then it was just gone.
i have never seen anything like this. we watch the skies quite a bit around here as we often see helicopters and it's a high traffic area for the planes. i didn't feel anything other than i want to know what i saw.
content.summary: Silver disc type shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a bright object in the sky. it reminded of me of someone stick welding. and seemed to change shape. i did manage to capture a little video of it. it could very well be trash being blown by the wind. that's why i thought i would let you guys take a look.
also this isn't the 1st sightings for me. i have had numerous sightings in the past 10 years. if you would interested in these sightings, just give me a call
content.summary: A shiny object moving north to south

content.detailedDescription:
Me encontraba de vacaciones en sierra de los padres . 
al momento de sacar la foto no lograba ver bien ya que me daba luz de sol de frente y me impedia ver bien la fotografía que habia sacado.
la montaña de roca donde me subi eran altas , eso me poder sacar la foto . pasaron unos veinte días hasta que logre darme cuenta del objeto que había logrado sacar en la foto, me sorrendi mucho . enseguida me di cuenta que era un ovni , entonces empeze a revisar mas fotos y logre divisar varios mas o el mismo objeto lamentablemente no encuentro mas fotos pero cuando las encuentre las volvere a subir.
senti mucha bronca por no poder darme cuenta lo que estaba delante de mis ojos , todavia sigo con la esperanza de volver a verlo. tengo mas fotoss que subir asi que espero que le guste esta foto.
desde ese momento 
tengo fotos donde se ve el objeto flotando en la misma posicion, la foto fue tomada con un celular , la camara tiene una resolucion de 5 megaixeles .
content.summary: Increble ovni captado con un telefono celular en argentina.

content.detailedDescription:
Was sleeping and got up at 9:05pm and looked out my bedroom window, saw the taurus area stars and one by one they were blanked out in a circle from 90 degrees to 0 to 270 to 90 and disappeared .. a solid smaller disk of unknown size or distance .. night .. blanked out the stars in a left circling manner. i live about 15 miles from an airport. saw no associated lights and no sound. moved too fast and weird for an aircraft. this is a general area where i have seen a huge cigar  shaped object before, similar time, summer and semi dark.

i have stood bridge watches in the navy, know my stars and constellations, have navigated many times with a sextant, morning and evening stars .. 
ho 214. all the other officers didn't know beans about astronomy and i had to tell them what stars they were shooting .. "no, you have a morning star list to shoot and this is evening, yes, it makes a difference."
content.summary: Got up from sleeping, looked out window, saw taurus area stars, disk circled and blanked them out.

content.detailedDescription: On february 7, 2015 approximately 11:17 am heading north on i 95 in maryland my son spotted a blimp looking grey object in the sky. i was driving about 75 mph at that time. my son who was in the rear passenger seat noticed the object. my wife was in the front passenger seat and my other son was in the back seat behind me. we all saw the object which appeared out of the passenger’s side just over the trees. at first it looked like a miniature floating blimp you would see over a business to attract customers however, this object followed along i 95 north for about 7 minutes keeping up with traffic then slowing down then moving fast again keeping up with us. there were no visible mooring lines that you see on a blimp and there was no cabin below this object that you normally see under a blimp. the object moved opposite a blimp would move (wings first instead of wings following the nose of the blimp). also, we did not notice any windows or writing on the object. what really caught our attention was how this object accelerated and was keeping up with us then went slower and accelerated right back parallel with us.  as we traveled along i 95 north, the object moved out of our sight. we were not sure where the object had gone as trees were in the way. my son took pictures and a video. i attached three pictures. two pictures were at regular distance and one picture zoomed in. we also took video of the object at regular distance (i apologize the video is downloaded sideways). if anyone knows what the object may be, please let us know.
content.summary: blimp like with no cabin under and moved slow then fast. followed along with traffic on 95 north in maryland as we were traveling approximately 75 miles per hour. we did not notice any window, writing, or a cabin.  .

content.detailedDescription:
Driving westward, observed stationery light in sky at fairly low altitude, appeared to be over downtown dallas.

when i turned south, saw another identical, at much higher altitude.  turned east and saw another at an altitude somewhere between the first and
second sightings.

at this writing, the object in the western sky has disappeared.
content.summary: Thee bright lights all at different altitudes

content.detailedDescription: February 13 2015 around 7:30 pm i was outside on my front porch filming a low bright star in the west..It was real low an bright it pulsated thats what caught my eye..As i was filming i saw a moving blinking object underneath it moving quickly so i focused in on the moving object, an filmed it on my 8mm video camera as it went over the interstate signs an on over in the trees, till i could not film it no more..I was like what is this, wow..
content.summary: I was out on front porch filming a real bright close star, an as i was filming i saw a blinking object moveing underneath the star heading southward.

content.detailedDescription: Just as i stated in the short description,seems that as it gets darker outside the ufo moves off to the west-southwest,not very fast,and it does nt move off in a strait line,at times it will in a zig zag flight pattern.As i stated above for a date feb. 13 2015,this is here every night,if the sky is clear enough,you will see it, i m in my drive way looking to the west through the trees is were i see it from.I love to be outside even in cold weather,to enjoy the out doors.I dont have any photo s of my sightings but i m going to work on getting a descent camera to take photo s with.I have 2 more sightings that 3 members of my family has witnessed with me about 3-4 yrs ago on christmas eve,we had cell out on us,but we were so fascinated with what we seeing non of us never even thought about taking pictures or videoing it.From all the shows ive seen on sighting s non have seen for what we have seen on that night.Then i had ,i was alone,something told me to look up,when i did,only one single amber light was above me just to the west.To be honest,i was a little worried about that one.I have no photos nor videos of my sightings,so i understand they are just stories,but they are the truth,the christmas eve sighting was amazing,i would love to share it with you sometime if your interested.I live about 4-5 miles south of arnold air force base that s in tullahoma,tn.
content.summary: It appears at dusk as a white solid light.It moves erratically,basically stays in same area,but moves up down,slight angles.

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out to go to the bathroom around 11 p.M. as was waiting for her. i looked up i seen traveling southwest to northeast a glowing reddish orange ball. it appeared to be moving across the sky at about the same speed you would see a small plane moving. there was absolutely no sound. it just looked like a glowing orange beach ball flying over my head. it was flying in a straight line at about 1500 to 2500 feet. there was no sound no wings no tail. just a reddish orange glowing ball. i watched it for 2 to 3 minutes.  till it flew out of view. i know i haven't been able to stop thinking about it.
content.summary: Glowing orange ball. flying s.W to n.E. about as fast as a small airplane. there was no sound. watched it for 2 or 3 min. it looked like a orange glowing beach ball.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to go to bed last night and it was 9:00 i had to be up in nine and a half hours so i set my stove timer because my cell phone died. i set the timer for 9:22 and got in bed. as i was laying in the dark with my eyes closed i got the creepiest feeling that there was something in my house. it felt like an evil presence. i kept having bad thoughts that it might be an alien being again. it has happened so many times in the past. but i told myself to be calm and try not to think about it and i will soon fall asleep. then i heard foot steps, walking around in my room and in the hall way. i tried to tell myself it was the dog but i have wood floors and the dogs nails make a clicking sound as well. i didn't hear her nails, just the creaking of the floor. i was so consumed with fear i didn't dare look. i also heard something messing with the door. again i tried to just blow it off until i saw through my eye lids a st-robbing light. it was a quick strobe and i heard a static like pop. i sat up quick in bed and realized my computer,(which was off and not fully charged) turned on by itself. i grabbed my husband at which time he grabbed me and said he was scared and having a bad dream himself. i told him what happened and he said not to worry and go back to sleep. then my dog jumped up and ran to the door barking like she does when the door bell rings. my husband then got up and i told him to check the yard. so he let our dog out and proceeded to check. usually when we let our dog out she goes potty and then comes back in right away, especially when it is as cold as it was. this time when we let her out she ran out, sniffed the ground out side stuck her head up and ran chasing something into the woods and did not return for about ten minutes.  i told my husband i wanted to turn the front porch light on, and the back porch light on because i wanted to know if something was out there so he did. we got back in bed and as soon as we did we saw a fluttering light and then the front porch light blew out. i was so scared i told my son to come in our room and sleep with us. i was scared and kept waking up the rest of the night for about a 6 hour span. each time being terrified there was something in the room with me. when i woke up in the morning i was groggy and my nose felt really stuffy. i blew my nose and a bunch of blood came out.
content.summary: Heard something in my house

content.detailedDescription: I was at the pharmacy and in the window i saw 3 strange objects and they flew off one by one. shaking and had a circle with triangle wings that slanted. the speed was not any speed i have ever seen.They only appeared on the window and seamed transparent in real vision.I lost the objects as they flew off the screen at incredible speed.
content.summary: Scary and made somebody cry

content.detailedDescription: I saw the moon in the sky and i decided to take photos of it,because it was the moon in the midday.Then when i saw the photos,the object was at the second photo.It made me to be surprised because i hadn't seen that objet while i was taking those photos.There wasn't any birds flying in the sky at that time and place.I was just with my three dogs and my cat.I cannot  say nothing on that object.Of course it was flying but i'm not sure if it was stopped in the sky or if it had appeared in the photo just by that take and disappeared or not after it.I became surprised and confused on it.I thought i had to send the photos to the director of investigation - steve hudgeons jr,and so i did it.The photo with the object it the 3806 attached to this relate.
content.summary: I don't know.I just saw the object after taken the photo.I hadn't saw it while i was taking those photos.

content.detailedDescription: It was 9pm while my niece and i were watching the sky on the back porch...I always told my niece that there were ufos up in the sky and as we watched a bright red object came in view..It circled a few times over the house and began to descend ...We hoped into my car and went to the field...My nieces home was only two blocks from the field...As we parked the car i got out first ..What i saw caused me so much excitement because this was the first time that close and able to clearly see the ship...I stood at the road and shouted to my niece to get out of the car and see what i was seeing...With only binoculars with me we both looked at the ship its hard to describe the ship as to me it looked like it was put together with nuts and bolts sort of connect objects...As the ship came down the lights on the ship became to change colour to a dark blue and it blended perfectly in the sky...It hovered over the treeline...I would say this thing was as big as 3 foot ball fields but im not good with measurements anyways...I looked at the clock on the car and it now said 915pm so we got back into the car and proceeded to go back to the house...We woke up in the driveway and we looked at each other and i said ....I guess we stayed out longer than expected...When i looked at the kitchen clock it now read 11pm....We both do not recall anything....I tell you that ship was extremely big and detailed...There is much more to my own encounters and drawings that i have
content.summary: Ship had strange structure like nuts and bolts...We stayed for 10mins which was 915pm once we started to drive we woke up in the lane way and the time was now 11pm which we were missing 2 hours

content.detailedDescription:
My mom would go outside to hang up clothes since we had no dier to dry them and even if it was cold we would hang them outside.

i recall the show the bold one's was on. that show would rotate to different parts of the show. i can't think of the word for it.  one would be doctor, one lawyer and maybe one would be police show.  it was very dark outside. my mom was out by the line taking care of the clothes that were hanging on the line. the line was near craig road which had woods & trees across it and on the other side of that was a golf course.

i was in the mobile home with my sister and brother.  i looked out the door towards my mom and saw the round bright orb floating over the trees. it was not very high over the trees. it moved slowly from south to northerly direction. rt 86 towards the county home. rt 198.  it did not move fast but at a steady speed.  it was very bright. 

it scared the hell out of me. i followed it and was so scared i locked the trailer door. my mom was inside by then and told me that would not stop them from taking me if they wanted me.  it looked like videos that i see on line. round glowing orb.  i know this is nothing to go on but i do consider it as probe of some kind checking out the area.  it was not swamp gas or anything.  it was very cold outside.

i know it is not a lot to go on.  later my mom forced me to take the trash out and i was scared as hell but since one did not tell my mom no i did it.

my brother and sister still say they remember seeing it now. 

i wanted to report it because i heard other reports of about that time in near by areas where people have seen the same thing.  i am sorry i can't remember the exact year. just about the time of year and what show was on tv.

note:

i have seen strange things in the sky since i was about 1964 old.  

i have heard the strange booms recently and about 10 years ago i heard strange machine over my house twice and it was not a plane or copter. neighbor heard it as well as i did. i did not want to look for i felt i knew it was a ufo and since i saw the one above i kind of rather not go looking for one.  if i heard it again i would look.  i just heard the sound being described by someone else on coast to coast am show.

so i decided even though this can't help much i wanted to report it anyhow.
content.summary: My family saw it floating over the trees at night. my mom was closest to it.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of september 9th 2014 at approximately 8:16pm eastern standard time, i twice observed and object circle the sky. it moved extremely smooth and in a north west circular motion, made no sound, and had a single orange light on the bottom that faded in and out every 3 seconds or so. this object was roughly 300-500ft to the west of me. on its second pass,i was able to shoot video with my cell phone. i wasn't able to zoom, but if u look closely(may have to zoom video), u can see the object move from left to right about 200-300ft in the air. it was probably 7 to 8ft in diameter. i you have any questions, feel free to contact me. thank you jon - louisville
content.summary: Circled across sky twice with a glowing light at the bottom that faded in and out

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was smoking out my window and i observed what looked like a plane at first then it got close real fast with no sound at all and landed in a school compound area, me and my girlfriend were seeing this first account without a camera but the second time it came around i was ready and waiting...It came in the same direction as it did the last time so i turned my device on to record this event unfold again this time on video. it was very emotional the feelings we had and the anxiety building up it felt like we were being invaded for sure. the lights came on even more brighter as it was landing and the object appeared right on camera and flickered and looks like it appeared to have used a time warp to jump place to place in a split second with excellent driving skills, there was 3 cameras at the school compound facing that general direction that were destroyed or sabotaged that night we went to look for footage that next morning from the night before and the brand new camera system they had put in mysteriously had been damaged somehow and i requested last known data from the images last recorded from a nearby city that's where the data goes they say. when i went to tell my friend who stayed a couple houses down and show him the video he said oh yeah awesome come get me if anything happens or if you see anything, i said ok and as i was walking out the door that same craft was just lifting off the school compound again really slow and quietly i ran back inside to get him and his son came out and witnessed an object the size or 2 or 3 houses big hovering away from site mentioned in a slow quiet flight path. he was running back inside to get his device but it was to late i got the only footage of this event witnessed by a few people of my reserve here. i am ready to blow the lid right off this conspiracy once and for all using this unseen by the public till now footage recorded that faithful night. the beings exist beyond a shadow of a doubt, open your eyes and your minds to the truth do not blind yourselves to the scary hard truth anymore quit being ignorant and oblivious to everything around you the word is much bigger then you think.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I also have a video and would like to meet with you...Several witnesses seen it too, possible radiation still present the object landed 3 times and caught it landing twice

content.detailedDescription: Driving south route 9 monmouth county nj. saw object while driving but what made me notice was the double light trail which was pointing west while the entire object as a whole was going east. i knew it was not an airplane due to light trail and direction and there were also no colored flashing lights. i first said is this a meteor or something entering the atmosphere. it looked like a comet with a double tail the most which was not possible. the core of object was very high so details were tough but was either square or blended into a star shape. once the object slowed down then sped up i realized it was something moving. i immediately said out loud that this is strange. it did not seem like a plane or helecopter at all the more i looked at it. it was not a meteor either because i se them all the time and they go quick. once the double trail caught my eye and the object slowed down i realized it was something else. i even opened the side window to ensure it wasnt a reflection on my windshield from the street lights. by the time i grabbed my cell phone and opened up the camera app the object was already speeding up then it was gone. i was mad i didnt even get a shot at it. also looked out the side window again and saw stars in the sky in the area with some clouds lower in the atmosphere. the object was speeding up right before i lost sight so my camera attempt made me not see the final way it left the area.
content.summary: Object heading east, double trail, center possible square, slowed down then sped up then gone.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were walking home after a movie.  we suddenly observed a bright light over the mountain, going south!  at first we thought it was an airplane with it,s landing lights on.  about half way across the sky it stopped and began to hover.  we watched it for a few minutes when another one joined it.  they hovered for several minutes and then separated for awhile then joined each other again.  they hovered there for about 5 minutes and suddenly one took off going se like a shooting star!  after a minute or so the other one shot off and followed it.  we decided not to say anything to any one because they would think we crazy!  we never broke our promised until now.  he is dead now so i guess i will now tell the story!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Brother and i walking home.  we saw a bright lite in the sky going  s  it stopped and hovered.  2nd groined it   they separated  came back together  zipped  se. like shooting. star. one then other!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on the frontage road off of i-80, west of the salt lake city international airport. i go out here to see birds and i was going to stop and smoke a cigarette since i don't smoke in my car. i saw above the horizon a red light with some orange lights in a horizontal line below. between the red and the orange lights it looked slightly hazy. i didn't think much of it as there is a smoke stack further west that has blinking lights on it.  when i stopped and looked i realized the lights were too high in the sky and i was too far east for them to be the smoke stack. when i looked back the red light went out and more lights blinked on in the line that was below it.  it then lurched northeast, a little closer to where i was watching. the lights now looked slightly larger. more lights blinked on one at a time in the line. the line was horizontal but slightly tilted up on the north side. the spacing and brightness of the lights seemed to make me think they were on the edge of a saucer shape but i can't be sure. all of the lights were steady bright and didn't pulse or move.  from the northern most light to the southern most light they slowly 1 by 1 blinked off. after the last one blinked off i could see in the far distance behind, to the west, of them the blinking light of an aircraft.  this was a smaller aircraft and seemed to be coming form the test range or air base in the west desert. i watched it head through were i had seen the lights, heading east, then bank north, cutting across all of the lanes of commercial aircraft coming from the airport. it continued north in the direction of hill air force base. later i saw another aircraft do the same. both of these aircraft were much smaller than the commercial crafts i watched after. after seeing the lights or ufo or whatever it was i sat and watched the aircraft from the airport to see if any of them traveled toward where i had seen it. they all followed their normal routes.  i have flown that way and watched planes from the great salt lake for some time and all of the rest of what i saw looked normal.
content.summary: 3-4 lights 1 red on top horizontal beneath. red went out lurched east quickly.  more lights in horizontal line one by one came on

content.detailedDescription: I observed a large object in the sw sky. the object appeared to be moving in a path towards the oquirrh  mountain range. i viewed the object through the binoculars and noticed a smaller object on the mountainside.
content.summary: Last night i observed two large orbs in the southwest sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos and video of a friends back yard view in yorba linda ca. i didn't see the objects until later review of video. i assumed they were ufo's. they followed one another (five total) at incredible speed and all disappeared at same location. i felt great pleasure to have witnessed the event. more so after meeting a stranger who video taped the same event. i saw them all disappear at the same location before clearing horizon.
content.summary: Took a panoramic video from back yard in yorba linda facing south with catalina island visible. didn't see objects until later review of video

content.detailedDescription: Was told by my cousin to run outside over the phone. time was 1:40 am about. noticed what looked like a very bright star. so that is what i presumed it was. that is until it pulsated very slowly. seemed to subtly change from a blue to orange glow. this was on my back patio at about 1000 ft i would say. too my west about a couple miles. immediately got the chills and went inside. i was also able to view it from my bedroom window. so i kept an eye on it, every now and than it would pulsate. i kept an eye out for it till about 2 am. looked out the window and it was gone. nowhere in sight.
content.summary: Blinked quite like a star until the object faded away for a split second than came back. did this several times. had a orange and blue color to it.

content.detailedDescription: I consistently see (about 4-5 a month)a white light traveling over my house from west to east very late at night. i smoke so i always go outside my house late at night. these balls of white light change speed and direction many of the times when they pass over. you can tell they are high as or higher then passenger airplanes. i can tell this because i see many types of jets over my house on there way to seattle but always traveling from south to north. i told my roommates about this and they didn't believe me until i woke one of them up one night to show her and it totally freaked her out because the one i showed her changed direction and slowed down and then sped up and went higher and out of sight in a few seconds. one night about 6 months ago about 1-2 am i was out smoking and watching the sky. i saw one of the craft and this time i had a telescope ready so i could get a better look at it. by some miracle i got the telescope locked on to it and this was definitely a round, white ufo. suddenly the craft shot up at an angle and out of view. then about 20 seconds later i saw this orange laser beam shoot from out of space into the atmosphere at about a 45deg angle downward and it disappeared from view behind the house next to mine. you could tell the beam came through about 50-100 miles away (possibly next to mnt st helens toward eastern washington). i was in the army for 8 years so i have seen many different types of military aircraft and believe me these lights aren't anything we fly or anything that our government has admitted to yet. back in 2001 i also saw a "giant" (easily the size of 2 football fields across) black triangle fly over my apt building at about 1am (again i was out smoking). it had no lights on it and made almost no sound other than the sound of the wind passing over the hull and a slight hum of some type of power source. it had to be flying about 200ft high and about 50mph at the most. like i said i could hear the sound of the wind passing over the hull. i wish i had a video camera that you could show these lights at night because i see them all the time. i even downloaded the app for the international space station to see if it might be what i am seeing but the thing wasn't even close. these things also change direction and speed so it really can't be that. really not sure what they are.
content.summary: Constanly see lights extremely high up  one night orange beam shoots out of it

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was at the slc airport filming approaching airplanes.  i didn't see anything while i was there.  i didn't notice anything strange until i got home and noticed objects appearing in the video frame extremely quickly and disappearing quickly.

i went through the entire footage that i had captured looking for these high speed anomalies and then slowed the video down to 1% of normal speed.  i was using a gopro hero 3+, so my footage was 1080p at 60 frames per second.  i was able to capture several frames of each object when slowed to 1% of normal.

the objects usually flew in a straight line, but sometimes veered off in different direction slightly.  they appeared white against the blue sky, but up close they were almost transparent.  however, i was able to capture a shadow on the pavement from one of them, so they are definitely solid and have some substance.

the closest approximation that i can make is to that of "rods", but these were not rod shaped. they were star shaped, or some type of central object with several protrusions coming out of it.

i have the analyzed video as well as the raw video, which i would love to be examined by a videographer or optical specialist.
content.summary: Extremely high speed objects

content.detailedDescription:
After an october afternoon of bow hunting for deer; both i and my best friend hiked back to his truck to drive home. while sitting on the tailgate of his truck to eat a sandwich, we both saw a high flying jet with a blinking light going from a south to north direction.Then we saw another light coming on the same flight path at a high rate of speed that came from the same direction. there was just a solid bright light that the object omitted. the flying object slowed down to the same speed as the jet. we thought at the moment that it might be a military plane that was following the other plane. but then the rear flying aircraft did a 90 degree turn and when straight up and disappeared into the outer atmosphere on this clear night sky. 
 over the years i have told this story to friends. some believed and some would ask if we had been drinking? the answer is no, we had not drank any alcohol.This was the late 70s and we knew of no aircraft that could turn on a 90 degree angle and go into outer space. the harrier jet could take off from an aircraft carrier or land but this thing did a 90 degree turn while going approximately 500 miles per hour, and accelerated straight up into the night sky.
content.summary: On a clear night, after hiking back to my hunting buddies truck; we observed what appeared to be a high flying jet w/a blinking light. flying south to north. another light came up at a high rate of speed & followed the jet for about a mile. then

content.detailedDescription:
Outside in back yard facing south. 1st object faded into view se traveling west. 2nd object appeared behind first at nearly the same location that the first appeared. distance between objects: hold arm outstretched in front of you, spread finger apart. 1st object would be at the index finger, second object would be at the pinky.

objects moved west low across the sky, 15-20 degrees above horizon. 1st object appeared to slow down and speed up a couple of times while object 2 stayed at a steady speed.

object one faded out of view. second object faded out when it reached the location as the 1st.

i observed both objects with a pair of infinity binoculars. objects could not be focused. both objects shone more bright than saturn with a deeper orange aura. object centers appeared to be yellow. i actually observed object one fade out through the binoculars.

air traffic:

high alt a/c traveling e to w. far south from objects. most likely ua #1166 (as far as i can tell via flightaware)

lower a/c w/sw from the objects, flight direction was e. could not tell alt, appeared to be 10-15 degrees from my position. after objects disappeared a/c turned w in same vic as where it was originally flight e. (most likely private a/c from chandler airport)

climbing a/c out of phx sky-harbor. climbing s/sw. nw of the objects, higher alt, climbing.
content.summary: 2 bright orange star-like objects slowly moving east to west. disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on maple street between 72nd street and 90th street and notice a bright white object in the sky. i thought that it was a star, i started watching the bright light when it began to dim. i could see red lights on the parameter, at first i thought maybe it was a helicopter with a big spot light, however, when it flew over i noticed that it had a triangular shape with red lights on the parameter. the craft moved slowly overhead and was heading north. i have never seen anything like this craft before.
content.summary: Bright light triangular object

content.detailedDescription: Looking north east saw star like object but noticed it was slowly floating more north east faster than a normal star move across the sky .I have about an hour on video while watching this object noticed smaller craft flying patterns north south and east then caught falling or streaking object in the camera it was probably a mile in a half from object i was first observing i have pictures and video of all the event have more intel but will only share this verbally. this is the biggest and most that i have at one time all together.Please contact me if this is a seri9us site deadcated to ufo and e.T phanomanon.                     not the first time i have got this major obe on tape.Not surprised but amazed at what it started doing after about 45 mons in it stated spinning and finally spun so hard it actually separated to look like a humming byrd then went in to a table like shape still spibing it finally we so lo i lost it in the tree line.Can't believe how long it hovered to discuss it self like a star but once it got down to bout 1000 ft it began radical spinning and an the a major kind of separation or thinking into humming bird figure then back together to form flat spinning table top.
content.summary: There was a star like that kept floating north east with others that fle around patterns and one sot like falling star almost like it got shot down
